TaskDescription.Detail: Repeat a cenrtain number of times, repeat until an array is explored to the end, and repeat according to conditions.

Assist.value: Repeats subsequent activity for the specified number of times.
Enter number of repetitions. Type 3.
Displaying a message box is repeated.
Type a sentence to be printed as below. 'This activity is repeated.'
Repeat retrieving each item from the array to the end.
Specify an array to be explored. Type this.textArray.
Specify a variable to store each item of the array. Type this.alphabet.
Print and check each item of the array.
Specify a variable to be printed. Type this.alphabet.
Ask the user to enter a number. Repetitive retrieving stops when it finds the number.
Specify a variable to store the value entered by the user. Type this.keyNumber.
Enter a guide message as below. 'Please enter an integer greater than or equal to 1.'
Retrieve each item of an array as the index of the array is incremented by 1, and escape from the iteration if certain condition is satisfied.
The index of an array should be less than the size of the array. Enter a condition as below. this.index1<10
The next steps are executed only when the retrieved item equals to the number entered by the user.
Enter a condition as below. this.numberArray[this.index1]==this.keyNumber
Print and check the retrieved item that satisfies the condition.
Type a sentence to be printed as below. this.keyNumber+' was retrieved. Stop iteration.'
Escape from the iteration of retrieving.
Print and check the retrieved item that does not satisfy the condition.
Type a sentence to be printed as below. this.numberArray[this.index1]+' was not the value the user entered.'
Increment the index of the array to be retrieved.
Specify a variable to assign a value. Type this.index1.
Enter a value. The index should be 1 greater than before so type as below. this.index1+1
Retrieve each item of an array as the index of the array is incremented by 1, and skip subsequent execution while continuing iteration if certain condition is satisfied.
The index of an array should be less than the size of the array. The index will be incremented before checking a condition. Enter a condition as below. this.index2+1<10
Increment the index of the array to be retrieved.
Specify a variable to assign a value. Type this.index2.
Enter a value. The index should be 1 greater than before so type as below. this.index2+1
The next step after End-IfThen is not executed when the retrieved item is even.
Enter a condition as below. this.numberArray[this.index2]%2==0
Skip the next activities and continue the iteration of retrieving.
Print and check the retrieved item that does not match the condition.
Type a sentence to be printed as below. this.numberArray[this.index2]+' is not even.'
